name: VNTrackObjectRequest
desc: An image analysis request that tracks the movement of a previously identified object across multiple images or video frames.

items.name: init(detectedObjectObservation: VNDetectedObjectObservation)
items.desc: Creates a new object tracking request with a detected object observation.

items.name: init(detectedObjectObservation: VNDetectedObjectObservation, completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new object tracking request with a detected object observation.

items.name: let VNTrackObjectRequestRevision2: Int
items.desc: Revision 2 of the object tracking algorithm.

items.name: let VNTrackObjectRequestRevision1: Int
items.desc: Revision 1 of the object tracking algorithm.
